metadata.description: Personal collection of Claude Code agents, skills, and commands for dotfiles management, version control, code review, and shell scripting

plugins.name: vcs-jujutsu-agent
plugins.description: Version control specialist using Jujutsu (jj) to handle all commit operations, rebase workflows, and PR preparation. Keeps version control context separate from main agent.

plugins.name: pr-feedback-reviewer-agent
plugins.description: Fetches all PR comments, evaluates validity, and provides prioritized recommendations for addressing pull request feedback

plugins.name: reviewer-agent
plugins.description: Reviews code quality, architecture, and documentation. Review-only agent that writes reports to scratch/ folder but doesn't modify production code.

plugins.name: shell-wizard-agent
plugins.description: Writes production-quality shell scripts with proper error handling, safety headers, function patterns, long flags, and shellcheck validation

plugins.name: use-jj-not-git-skill
plugins.description: Comprehensive guidance for using Jujutsu (jj) for version control. Covers commands, concepts, workflows, and Git command translation.

plugins.name: skill-creator-skill
plugins.description: Meta-skill for creating new Claude Code skills with proper structure, documentation, and best practices

plugins.name: gitingest-command
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive codebase digests using gitingest for sharing repository context
